title: Temperature-Driven Variability in Emergency Diagnostic Accuracy by a Leading Language Model
details: P Jarrett, J Hill, M Howell, K Grabow Moore, JJ Thoppil… - medRxiv, 2025
abstract: Objectives Large language models (LLMs) are being deployed in healthcare to improve clinical decision support. Yet, the" temperature" parameter, which controls LLM randomness, may significantly influence diagnostic performance and is often left …
